*[[Nest Ball#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Nest Ball''' is a type of [[Poké Balls|Poké Ball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Poké Ball active and there is a remaining supply in the Poké Ball selector. ==Details== A specialized Poké Ball to capture Pokémon with, it provides an increased catch rate on earlier routes. ==Rates== Rates are determined by the highest unlocked region.
